newsitem.title: USA: Micrografx, SAP in license pact.
newsitem.headline: Micrografx, SAP in license pact.

text.p: Micrografx Inc said on Tuesday it signed a licensing agreement with Germany's SAP AG that would enable corporate customers to view SAP's R/3 reference models using Micrografx ABC FlowCharter business-diagramming software.

Micrografx said it would develop ABC FlowCharter process models of the R/3 reference model, set for release in mid-1997. That would allow SAP customers to analyze the 800 different business-process models within the R/3 system, the company said.

J. Paul Grayson, chairman and chief executive officer, said: "Our goal is for Micrografx to become the front-end graphics standard for bringing the process models of the R/3 system to the Microsoft Windows desktop."
